marytts.tools.dbselection
Class FeatureMaker

java.lang.Object
  marytts.tools.dbselection.FeatureMaker

public class FeatureMaker
extends java.lang.Object

Takes text and converts to features Needs a running Mary server

Author:
Anna Hunecke

                                          int textId,
                                          java.lang.String feas)
Process one sentences from text to target features

Parameters:
nextSentence - the sentence
filename - the file containing the sentence
feas - target features names separated by space (ex. "phone next_phone selection_prosody")
Returns:
the result of the processing as MaryData object

processSentenceToFeatures

protected static byte[] processSentenceToFeatures(java.lang.String nextSentence,
                                                  int textId,
                                                  TargetFeatureComputer featureComputer)
Process one sentences from text to target features

Parameters:
nextSentence - the sentence
filename - the file containing the sentence
feas - target features names separated by space (ex. "phone next_phone selection_prosody")
Returns:
a byte array representing the feature vectors for the entire sentence

collectTokens

protected static java.lang.StringBuilder collectTokens(org.w3c.dom.Node nextToken,
                                                       java.lang.StringBuilder sentence)
Collect the tokens of a sentence

Parameters:
nextToken - the Node to start from checkCredibility returns 0 if the sentence is useful 1 if the sentence contains unknownWords (so the sentence is not useful) 2 if the sentence contains strangeSymbols (so the sentence is not useful)

checkReliability

protected static int checkReliability(org.w3c.dom.Element t)
Phonemise the given document with the help of JPhonemiser g2p_method "contains-unknown-words" or "contains-strange-symbols",

Parameters:
d -
Returns:
0 if the sentence is useful 1 if the sentence contains unknownWords 2 if the sentence contains strangeSymbols
